description: The colors and dark mode are truly impressive.
summary: This is easily the most beautiful calculator for Linux

description: Rich Features.Ease of Use.It is the best Calculator for me.
Best converter for common daily usage.

For first sight almost the best. For second sadly not yet.

- On HDPI screen the display background image is incorrect.
- There are some graphical glitches on the fonts when click into the calculation.
- Would be lot more perfect if the standard window decorations/window controls (minimize, maximize) used the system level appearance instead of hard-coded Elementary.
- Would be nice if the history could be faster and comfortable reachable. (Something like GNOME stock calculator, or something like optional attached side window.)

Really-really good, but for me it is not the perfect choice for daily usage yet.
summary: Seems very capable and almost the best but with bugs

description: Очень приятный внешний вид. Прекрасное приложение.
